file_content.text: Captain Hanthor. The Specialists are no longer a problem.
The docking ring in shambles and all five Specialists gone? Excellent! The Archon will be furious.
That can work to our advantage. Angry Hutts are careless Hutts.
Mission's accomplished. Now you need to hold up your end.
My time is valuable, Captain. I expect to be compensated appropriately.
I'm sure you can handle any necessary cleanup. If we're going to save this planet, I have things to do.
I'll ensure you receive an appropriate payment. You've bought us time and security; it's the very least I can offer.
